page.title: 16TACKLEY & WOOTON FOOTPATHS
page.content: There are 23 miles of{footpaths}in the parish of Tackley.{The Wootton, {Tackley and District Footpath Society} exists for the enjoyment and protection of the footpaths of both parishes and beyond. Each month one member leads a walk of about 5 miles but once or twice a year we have an all-day walk of about 10 miles. In the winter, before the bird nesting season, the group clears footpaths that have become blocked by undergrowth and erects signs where necessary. The group has built bridges to cross streams. Each {Summer }all the { {footpaths }are walked during{Footpath {Week} which is organised by the { {Parish Council}whose duty it is to maintain the paths.
